text:
@DHSCgovuk The guidance on #coronavirus symptoms has been updated again!

Break the lockdown rules! Do what the f*** you like, but: 

#StayAlert to being snitched on and if found out, 

▶️Get @bbclaurak & @BBCNews to cover your arse
▶️Direct your🤖army to post deflecting tweets
